author: Mary Berry
method: Cut the tomatoes in half and place in a bowl with the remaining ingredients. Season well with salt and pepper, cover and chill until ready to serve.
ingredients: 250g/9oz small ripe tomatoes on the vine,  250g/9oz mozzarella pearls,  about 8 basil leaves, finely chopped,  2 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  salt and pepper
